overview: Italian stud Roman Todd is engaged to be married to gorgeous older woman Diana Devoe. But when he meets his fianc√©'s brother (Noah Donovan) for the first time, he feels an unmistakable attraction to his muscular, well-hung future brother in law. Meanwhile, Roman's younger brother (Troy Accola) is also mesmerized by Noah, and seduces the sexy older man after a late night tryst with boyfriend Billie Ramos. When Roman and Noah finally get up the nerve to share a first kiss, unsuspecting Diana walks in on them and then storms out of the house in despair. Can this family ever be put back together? And do these lustful, sex-crazed men even care?
title: His Sister's Lover 3
